abilities.description: Your seagoing flagship is armed with cannons, transports crew, cargo, and passengers, and can equip support vehicle and module assets. In addition, it has up to 5 hold that acts as supply for you and your allies when taking action or suffering a cost related to shipwide gear and provisions.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.edac426b7c23f060]{Finish an Expedition} (dangerous or greater) on a seagoing journey and score a hit, this expedition strengthened your ties to your ship and crew. You and your allies may mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track.
You fly a distinctive flag. Envision its design. Once per situation, when you hoist the colors in a dramatic moment, you and your allies take +1 momentum.
